name: Raging Bull
description: You tackle like a raging bull. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d12 + MOVE damage on a hit. This move ignores the effects of moves that would reduce its damage (Harden, Reflect, etc.).
The type of damage dealt by this move depends on the breed of its user.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
